sentences.sContent: Therefore, we are not to rely on feelings, but to have faith in the facts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, we are not to rely on feelings, but to have faith in the facts.
sentences.sCn: 因此，我们不能依靠我们的感觉，而是要将信心建立在事实上。

sentences.sContent: But what of the resources we rely on to sustain and develop our technology?
sentences.sContent_eng: But what of the resources we rely on to sustain and develop our technology?
sentences.sCn: 但是我们依靠什么资源来支持和发展我们的科技？

sentences.sContent: However, many objects rely on other objects or layers of infrastructure.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, many objects rely on other objects or layers of infrastructure.
sentences.sCn: 然而，许多对象依赖基础结构的其它对象或层。
